olympics 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Title

    get_single_event.Rd

    Title

    get_single_event(url)

    Arguments

    url

    the URL to the event

    Value

    a tibble of event summary

    Examples

    get_single_event("https://olympics.com/en/olympic-games/tokyo-2020/results/shooting")
#> # A tibble: 15 × 4
#>    `__typename` slug                        title                       gender
#>    <chr>        <chr>                       <chr>                       <chr> 
#>  1 GameEvent    skeet-men                   Skeet Men                   Men   
#>  2 GameEvent    trap-women                  Trap women                  Women 
#>  3 GameEvent    10m-air-rifle-women         10m Air Rifle women         Women 
#>  4 GameEvent    25m-pistol-women            25m Pistol Women            Women 
#>  5 GameEvent    10m-air-rifle-men           10m Air Rifle Men           Men   
#>  6 GameEvent    50m-rifle-3-positions-men   50m Rifle 3 Positions Men   Men   
#>  7 GameEvent    10m-air-pistol-mixed-team   10m Air Pistol Mixed Team   Mixed 
#>  8 GameEvent    10m-air-rifle-mixed-team    10m Air Rifle Mixed Team    Mixed 
#>  9 GameEvent    25m-rapid-fire-pistol-men   25m Rapid Fire Pistol Men   Men   
#> 10 GameEvent    10m-air-pistol-men          10m Air Pistol Men          Men   
#> 11 GameEvent    trap-mixed-team             Trap Mixed Team             Mixed 
#> 12 GameEvent    skeet-women                 Skeet women                 Women 
#> 13 GameEvent    trap-men                    Trap Men                    Men   
#> 14 GameEvent    50m-rifle-3-positions-women 50m Rifle 3 Positions women Women 
#> 15 GameEvent    10m-air-pistol-women        10m Air Pistol women        Women
